sentence.english: She isn't working as an accountant anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ella ya no trabaja como contadora.

sentence.english: Are they auditioning for the new actor in the play?
sentence.spanish: ¿Hacen una audición para el nuevo actor en la obra?

sentence.english: She was serving passengers as an air hostess.
sentence.spanish: Ella servía a los pasajeros como azafata.

sentence.english: I'm not studying to become an architect.
sentence.spanish: No estudio para ser arquitecto.

sentence.english: I was painting landscapes as an artist.
sentence.spanish: Pintaba paisajes como artista.

sentence.english: Were you dreaming of being an astronaut as a child?
sentence.spanish: ¿Soñabas con ser astronauta de niño?

sentence.english: They are observing the stars as astronomers.
sentence.spanish: Ellos observan las estrellas como astrónomos.

sentence.english: Does he train like a professional athlete?
sentence.spanish: ¿Entrena como un atleta profesional?

sentence.english: She wasn't writing her first book as an author.
sentence.spanish: Ella no escribía su primer libro como autora.

sentence.english: Are we hiring a baby-sitter for tonight?
sentence.spanish: ¿Contratamos una niñera para esta noche?

sentence.english: He doesn't wake up early like a baker.
sentence.spanish: Él no se despierta temprano como un panadero.

sentence.english: He isn't working as a bricklayer anymore.
sentence.spanish: Él ya no trabaja como albañil.

sentence.english: Are they training to become bus drivers?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se están formando para ser conductores de autobús?

sentence.english: She was meeting with a businessman yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Ella se reunía con un empresario ayer.

sentence.english: I'm not buying meat from the butcher today.
sentence.spanish: No compro carne en la carnicería hoy.

sentence.english: Were you learning carpentry from your father?
sentence.spanish: ¿Aprendías carpintería de tu padre?

sentence.english: They are planning their teaching careers.
sentence.spanish: Ellos planean sus carreras de enseñanza.

sentence.english: Does he handle money as a cashier?

sentence.english: Does he create new recipes as a chef?

sentence.english: She wasn't studying to become a chemist.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estudiaba para ser química.

sentence.english: They are cleaning offices as cleaners.
sentence.spanish: Ellos limpian oficinas como limpiadores.

sentence.english: Are we visiting the cobbler to repair our shoes?

sentence.english: He doesn't argue with his colleagues.
sentence.spanish: Él no discute con sus colegas.

sentence.english: She doesn't advise companies as a consultant.

sentence.english: I was speaking with a school counselor.

sentence.english: Does she practice every day as a professional dancer?

sentence.english: They weren't hiring a data analyst for the project.

sentence.english: Is he visiting the dentist every six months?

sentence.english: Were you reporting to the director of the department?

sentence.english: They weren't studying medicine to become doctors.

sentence.english: I was driving trucks as a driver.

sentence.english: Does he analyze market trends as an economist?

sentence.english: She wasn't treating her employees fairly.

sentence.english: Are we discussing the new policy with our employer?
